1.name: Noisy Mouse
1.text: If you receive [color]mortal damage[/color], your body will be filled with adrenaline.

2.name: Noisy Mouse
2.text: During an adrenaline rush, your [color]attack damage will be increased[/color]!

3.name: Noisy Mouse
3.text: Be careful though, the rush will only last while your [color]HP is dropping down to zero[/color].)
